title: Is An Electric Rider Right For You?
p: Cub Cadet® riding mowers provide a hassle-free, easy to use mowing experience, delivering uncompromising power, minimal maintenance and the cut quality you can expect from its gas counterpart. But is an electric riding mower right for you? You’ll need to consider a few factors before making that determination.
